description.p: Extract the month name from a date or datetime value.
Returns the month name from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The MonthName function extracts the month name from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: MonthName() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, MonthName(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|October
